attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned, feel that the new logo (or motif) that has been unveiled does not represent the best of the London and the United Kingdom.  We feel that it does not represent the spirit of the Olympic Games.  We wish the Olympic logo be changed to something more suitable, that truly reperesnts London.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
